data.title: Dining experience at it's worse.
data.text: We had reservations for a large party for dinner, we arrived and were seated at 5:30 PM. The restaurant was recommended but upon arrival it was noticed almost empty for that time of day in the area it's located. The waitress took our drink orders and stated this was her first day, hint number two that we should have walked. fast forward, all the orders were taken and we sat and waited for over an hour to get served and most of the orders were wrong. My wife was not served at all, after waiting two hours she had to take with, we could no longer stay there. I will give a good rating when it's deserved but will also state the true hard facts when not satisfied.

data.title: Specials are a very good value
data.text: Just had their grilled fish. It came with rice, beans and tortilla. Cooked perfectly and very, very good. Price was very reasonable.

data.title: Good food at very reasonable prices
data.text: A new Caribbean restaurant pops up regularly in our community. We wanted to give this one a try so we got a Groupon. The prices are so reasonable that our meal was free at the time of service except for tax and tip. We had the fried whole fish, yellow rice, black beans and a basket of chips and salsa. Service was slow for a lunch meal when most of us working folk are limited on time. Maybe lunch specials could be ready for quick turnover. There was a full bar as well as a dance floor and a stage. We had a feeling this could be a busy place on a weekend night. If pleasant and polite staff make for success, then this restaurant should succeed.

data.title: OK
data.text: Good service but not crazy about the quality of the food. The drinks were fine. Seems the drinks are more of the focus than the food

data.title: Latino Food at a good price
data.text:
A nice place to eat on Landis Avenue.   We arrived around 4 PM on a Sunday night.  The service is good, the food is good and there is a lot of it to say the least.  if you want to have the full effect of getting three different types of mojito's I suggest arriving around 7 PM or later.  There is a very big dance floor and a great stage for the band.

My wife had the shrimp chipolte with rice.  It definitely had some heat and  there was quite a bit to eat.  I had the green chicken enchilada.  Serious portions and quite good as well that I was able to taste the chicken.  The green for the chicken was because of the tamairillo sauce.

data.title: Good food at a good price!
data.text: This is a new restaurant and the food was good latin/mexican at a very reasonable price. Nice atmosphere although the restaurant was not very busy the night we were there.

data.title: The best i Mexican food I have found in the Vineland area
data.text: My meal was combination of chicken/steak fajitas was great. Cooked perfectly, tasted great, large serving, fresh and hot. They have a full bar, music/DJ in the evening and serving food late too. The management is very pleasant and very willing to make you delighted.
